name: Dices N' Dragons
description:
READY YOUR BETS! THE FIGHT IS STARTING!

Dragon fighting may not be moral, but it sure is easy money if you plan your moves right.

Plan your moves well, as randomness can be a bitch. Attack, Defend and Heal by rolling dice and choosing where to allocate the values. Once you have your plan, execute it and see it unfold in real time.

CONTROLS

Click and Drag - Most things

Esc - Go back to main menu
